mapper.select: select va.id, va.appointment_time, va.appointment_status, ai.name apartment_name, gi.name, gi.url from view_appointment va left join lease.apartment_info ai on va.apartment_id = ai.id and ai.is_deleted = 0 left join graph_info gi on ai.id = gi.item_id and gi.item_type = 1 and gi.is_deleted = 0 where va.is_deleted = 0 and va.user_id = #{id} order by va.appointment_time desc
